src_original: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - mamāpi bhagavan pratibhātiyenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
bhagavānāha - pratibhātu te śāriputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
yad api tadbhagavan bodhicittaṃ sarvajñatācittamanāsravaṃ cittamasamaṃ cittaṃ asamasamaṃ cittamasādhāraṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ,
